Package src.model

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.model.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Room>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeluxeRoom, DoubleRoom, SingleRoom, VipSuite
    public abstract class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Room>
    The Class that handles the data of hotel's rooms.
    Since:
    2022-03-30
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        roomStatus - status of the room
        isWifiEnabled - whether is wifi enabled
